mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SNTNC(SNTNC_ETPR_CODE, SNTNC_WRTING_EMPL_ID, SNTNC_CN, SNTNC_WRTING_DATE, COMMON_CODE_SNTNC_CTGRY) VALUES (#{sntncEtprCode}, #{sntncWrtingEmplId}, #{sntncCn}, SYSDATE, 'SNTNC010')
mapper.select: SELECT S.SNTNC_ETPR_CODE, S.SNTNC_CN, S.SNTNC_WRTING_EMPL_ID, E.EMPL_NM AS sntncWrtingEmplNm, S.SNTNC_WRTING_DATE, S.COMMON_CODE_SNTNC_CTGRY, UF.UPLOAD_FILE_ORGINL_NM, UF.UPLOAD_FILE_SN, UF.UPLOAD_FILE_SIZE, E.PROFL_ETPR_CODE, (SELECT F1.UPLOAD_FILE_STRE_NM FROM UPLOAD_FILE F1 WHERE E.PROFL_ETPR_CODE = F1.UPLOAD_FILE_ETPR_CODE) AS proflPhotoFileStreNm FROM SNTNC S JOIN EMPL E ON S.SNTNC_WRTING_EMPL_ID = E.EMPL_ID LEFT JOIN UPLOAD_FILE UF ON s.SNTNC_ETPR_CODE = UF.UPLOAD_FILE_ETPR_CODE WHERE s.COMMON_CODE_SNTNC_CTGRY = 'SNTNC010' AND e.COMMON_CODE_DEPT = ( SELECT e1.COMMON_CODE_DEPT FROM EMPL e1 WHERE e1.EMPL_ID = #{emplId} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO UPLOAD_FILE(UPLOAD_FILE_SN, UPLOAD_FILE_ETPR_CODE, UPLOAD_FILE_ORGINL_NM, UPLOAD_FILE_STRE_NM, UPLOAD_FILE_SIZE, UPLOAD_FILE_RGSDE) VALUES (UPLOAD_FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{sntncEtprCode}, #{originalFileName}, #{newFileName}, #{fileSize}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO RECOMEND (SNTNC_ETPR_CODE, RECOMEND_EMPL_ID, RECOMEND_SN) VALUES (#{sntncEtprCode}, #{recomendEmplId}, RECOMEND_SEQ.NEXTVAL)
INSERT INTO ANSWER( ANSWER_NO, SNTNC_ETPR_CODE, ANSWER_WRTING_EMPL_ID, ANSWER_CN, ANSWER_DATE) VALUES (ANSWER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{sntncEtprCode}, #{answerWrtingEmplId}, #{answerCn}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT A.ANSWER_NO, A.ANSWER_CN, A.ANSWER_DATE, A.ANSWER_WRTING_EMPL_ID, E.EMPL_NM AS answerWrtingEmplNm, UF.UPLOAD_FILE_STRE_NM AS proflPhotoFileStreNm FROM ANSWER A, EMPL E JOIN UPLOAD_FILE UF ON UF.UPLOAD_FILE_ETPR_CODE = E.PROFL_ETPR_CODE WHERE A.SNTNC_ETPR_CODE = #{sntncEtprCode} AND A.ANSWER_WRTING_EMPL_ID = E.EMPL_ID ORDER BY A.ANSWER_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SNTNC(SNTNC_ETPR_CODE, SNTNC_WRTING_EMPL_ID, SNTNC_SJ, SNTNC_CN, SNTNC_WRTING_DATE, COMMON_CODE_SNTNC_CTGRY) VALUES (#{sntncEtprCode}, #{sntncWrtingEmplId}, #{sntncSj}, #{sntncCn}, SYSDATE, 'SNTNC011')
mapper.select: SELECT S.SNTNC_ETPR_CODE, S.SNTNC_WRTING_EMPL_ID, S.SNTNC_SJ, S.SNTNC_CN, S.SNTNC_WRTING_DATE FROM SNTNC S JOIN EMPL E ON E.EMPL_ID = S.SNTNC_WRTING_EMPL_ID WHERE S.COMMON_CODE_SNTNC_CTGRY = 'SNTNC011' AND E.COMMON_CODE_DEPT = ( SELECT E1.COMMON_CODE_DEPT FROM EMPL E1 WHERE E1.EMPL_ID = #{emplId} )

SELECT VR.VOTE_REGIST_NO, VR.VOTE_REGIST_EMP_ID, VR.VOTE_REGIST_TITLE, VR.VOTE_REGIST_START_DATE, VR.VOTE_REGIST_END_DATE, VR.VOTE_REGIST_AT FROM VOTE_REGIST VR, EMPL E WHERE E.EMPL_ID = VR.VOTE_REGIST_EMP_ID AND E.COMMON_CODE_DEPT = ( SELECT E1.COMMON_CODE_DEPT FROM EMPL E1 WHERE E1.EMPL_ID = #{emplId} )

SELECT VO.VOTE_REGIST_NO, VO.VOTE_OPTION_NO, VO.VOTE_OPTION_CONTENTS, COALESCE(VOTES.VOTECNT_BY_EMP, 0) AS VOTEDAT, COALESCE(VOTE_TOTAL_COUNT, 0) AS VOTETOTALCNT FROM VOTE_OPTION VO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT VOTE_OPTION_NO, COUNT(*) AS VOTECNT_BY_EMP FROM VOTE WHERE VOTE_PARTCPTN_EMP_ID = #{emplId} GROUP BY VOTE_OPTION_NO ) VOTES ON VO.VOTE_OPTION_NO = VOTES.VOTE_OPTION_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT VOTE_OPTION_NO, COUNT(*) AS VOTE_TOTAL_COUNT FROM VOTE GROUP BY VOTE_OPTION_NO ) TOTAL_VOTES ON VO.VOTE_OPTION_NO = TOTAL_VOTES.VOTE_OPTION_NO WHERE VO.VOTE_REGIST_NO = #{voteRegistNo} ORDER BY VOTE_OPTION_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VOTE_REGIST( VOTE_REGIST_NO, VOTE_REGIST_EMP_ID, VOTE_REGIST_TITLE, VOTE_REGIST_START_DATE, VOTE_REGIST_END_DATE, VOTE_REGIST_AT ) VALUES ( VOTE_REGIST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{voteRegistEmpId}, #{voteRegistTitle}, TO_DATE(#{voteRegistStartDate}), TO_DATE(#{voteRegistEndDate}), '0' )
